item.title: index
item.description: date: “2019-02-11T19:30:08+10:00” draft: false title: Academic History weight: 4 Syntax Highlighting Whisper uses the in-built code highlighting that ships with hugo. https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/ You can insert code snippets in any markdown file by using standard code fences syntax ie: ``` insert code here ``` You can specify the langauge by adding a declaration after the backticks ```javascript insert code here ``` Pygments Options The following code highlighting options are configured in the config.
